Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We hypothesize that when this man developed type 2 diabetes , chronic polyuria due to nephrogenic diabetes insipidus was sufficient to precipitate hyperosmolar dehydration .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| type 2 diabetes |
| chronic polyuria |
| nephrogenic diabetes insipidus |
| hyperosmolar dehydration |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

(Note: "chronic polyuria" is a symptom of nephrogenic diabetes insipidus, so it is not listed separately as a disease entity in this context.)
